wikipedia_page.main: Peter Campbell was a Scottish footballer, who played for Glasgow Perthshire, Burton Swifts, Greenock Morton and Scotland.

response: * Patrick Campbell (1684–1751), also known as Peter Campbell, British Army General and Member of Parliament

* Peter Campbell (Greenock Morton footballer) (fl. 1898), Scottish footballer (Greenock Morton, Burton Swifts and Scotland)

* Peter Campbell (Rangers footballer) (c. 1850s–1883), Scottish footballer (Rangers, Blackburn Rovers and Scotland)
